1. Opinion | I Teach Creative Writing. This Is What A.I. Is Doing to Students.  The New York Times
  2. Apparently, comparing someone’s writing to AI is now a “classist slur;” and other news.  Literary Hub
  3. Opinion | AI didn’t write this. But it helped me find my voice.  The Washington Post
  4. One for the Road: Write and wrong  We Are Tyrone
  5. Opinion | AI Is Reshaping Student Writing, Not Replacing It  Mississippi Free Press

item.title: Netflix uses generative AI in one of its shows for first time - The Guardian
item.description:
1. Netflix uses generative AI in one of its shows for first time  The Guardian
  2. Netflix Is Using Startup Runway AI's Video Tools for Production  Bloomberg.com
  3. Netflix’s Ted Sarandos Says AI Will Make Movies and TV “Better, Not Just Cheaper”  The Hollywood Reporter
  4. Netflix Used AI to Generate VFX Footage for "First Time"  CineD
